title: silver flex queue team
body:
hey guys

this isnt anything serious just for anyone silver 5 - silver 1 in flex queue that wants to play with us. 

we are looking for 3 people in each role to join our club.

the idea is whenever we have at least one person from all roles online, we have a game. simple.

if you are interested add burstfire303.

again, not an org or a "competitive team" just join if you play a lot of ranked and dont like solo queue. ty.

ps - must have a mic + discord

replies.body: Add me I am always up for a game and silver 2 rn in flex mainly play mid
